Hi, my name is

Bart Stefanski.

I build things for the web.

I am a hard-working, diligent and enthusiastic software engineer based in Tricity, Poland. I am passionate about clean, easily modifiable code. I continuously develop my skills and knowledge.

Download Resume

About Me

I am a young and passionate software engineer who enjoys building things on the Internet.

Developing my (not only technical) knowledge is a matter of great importance since my early childhood. I don't want to limit myself to do only one thing. I am always eager to work with both frontend and backend technology stacks (also don't mind writing tests).

Here are a few technologies I have worked with recently:

  • JavaScript (ES6 +)
  • React.js
  • Vue.js
  • Gatsby
  • Flux (Redux, Vuex)
  • HTML / Pug
  • CSS & Sass
  • Flexbox
  • TypeScript
  • Node.js (Nest.js)
  • WebSockets, Event Streams
  • Redis Queues (Bull.js)
  • Basic, JWT, OAuth2, Sessions
  • Postgres, Mongo, Redis, MySQL
  • Java (Spring) ecosystem
  • Testcafe
  • Jest
  • Gulp.js
  • Git & GitFlow
  • SOLID
  • Clean Code & Architecture
  • Unit/Integration/E2E Testing
  • IntelliJ/VSCode

Professional Experience

Jr. Frontend Engineer

@ GrowthHero.io

07.2019 - 12.2019

  • Writing end to end tests with Testcafe, JavaScript. Manually testing web application in mobile devices to ensure responsiveness.
  • Making new features and solving tasks primarily using JavaScript, React, Conventional Redux, Styled Components, Shopify Polaris.
FullStack Engineer

@ Nine.dev

06.2019 - 10.2019

  • Working with a team of three software engineers to build a web hosting control panel
  • Using a variety of different languages, libraries, frameworks such as JavaScript, Java, Spring, Spock, Vue.js, Vuex, Bulma, WebSockets, RabbitMQ, and Heroku
  • Doing code review, pair programming and participating in standups

Featured Projects

SeoInsights.io

An application that allows Shopify Store's Owner to scan for empty alt tags, broken links, best practices, performance tips. And also provides the ability to override all/empty alt tags.
  • Nest.js (TypeScript)
  • React.js (Hooks)
  • Styled Components
  • Postgres
  • Bull.js
  • Shopify API

Coachy.life

Demo: https://coachy-frontend.herokuapp.com/

An online platform for personal trainers, allows creating and managing training plans, monitoring a client's progress, real-time communicating with clients, fitness calculators, and statistics.
  • Java (Spring)
  • Spock
  • Vue + Vuex
  • Mongo
  • Websockets
